attributes.action: say it is time after 2 more British Deaths in Iraq that we ask the Government to retreat from this battle and leave it to Iraq to manage on their own
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With many deaths in Iraq with Suicide Bombers and land mines, it is time for out Armed Forces to come out of Iraq.

There is many young soldiers out there, and many parents in this Country worried about them and it is now time for Tony Blair to be brave and understand the feeling for the people of UK and say enough is enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
